_header: Saint Mary in Lent among other days good
Subjects: saints’ lives; Virgin Mary, Annunciation to; Annunciation, feast of
_description: The Feast of the Annunciation in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEynte Marie dai in leynte among oþer dawes godeRiȝt is
                    uorteholde hei hoso him vnderstode…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Nou bidde we Ihesu godes sone þat þulke heie dai
                    wroȝteþat we mote come to þulke Ioie þat he ous to
                    boȝte

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint mary day in lente among oþer dayes godeyȝt is for
                    to holden hy who so hym ondirstode…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…now bidde we Ihesus goddes sone þat þulke hy day
                    wrouȝtebringe vs to þat ilke ioye þat he vs to dere
                    abouȝte

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
SEint Marie day in Lente among oþur dayes godeRiht is forto
                    holden heiȝe hose him vndurstode…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Now bidde we Ihesu Godes sone þat þulke heiȝe day
                    wrouhteÞat we mote come to þat ilke ioye þat he vs to
                    brouhte Amen
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint Mari day in lenton among oþer days godeRight is forto
                    holden hey Who so him vnderstode…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…Now bidde we Ihesu godessone þat þilk hey day
                    wroughteþat we mote come to þe ioye þat he us to a
                    boughte
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

BodTan17.First Lines:
SEint mari day in lentoun a mong oþere dais godeRight is to
                    holde it hiȝe who so it vndirstode…
BodTan17.Last Lines:
…Nov bidde we goddis sone ihesu þat hiȝe day he
                    wrouȝteÞat we mote come to þat ioye þat he to vs
                    bouȝte

OxfTri57.First Lines:
Seint Marie day in leynte among oþere dayes godeRyȝt ys
                    for to holde heȝe who so him vnderstode…
OxfTri57.Last Lines:
…Now bidde we ihesu godis sone þat þulke heie day
                    wroȝteÞat we mote come to þulke ioye þat he vs to
                    boȝtee

CULFf548.First Lines:
Sauynt Mary day in lentone among hir dayes gudeIs wele worthi
                    halloed to be quo so wele vnder stode…
CULFf548.Last Lines:
…So þat ȝe may on paske day quen ȝe hafe clenly
                    fastResafe goddes flesche & his blode worthely at þe
                    laste
CULFf548.Editions:
Downing,  Janay Young A.,
                        ed.  
             “A Critical Edition of Cambridge University MS Ff.5.48.” 
         2 vols. Diss. University of Washington, 1969: 228-9.

CamCCC145.First Lines:
Seinte Marieday in leinte among oþer dawes godeRiȝt is
                    forto holde heiȝe wo so him vnderstode…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…Nou bidde we ihesu godessone þat þulke heiday
                    wroȝteÞat we mote come to þulke ioie þat he to us
                    broȝte
CamCCC145.Editions:
D’Evelyn,  Charlotte,  and  A. J. Mill, eds.  
             The South English Legendary: Corpus Christi College Cambridge MS. 145
                and British Museum MS. Harley 2277, with variants from Bodley MS. Ashmole 43 and
                British Museum MS. Cotton Julius D.ix.
EETS
         o.s. 235 (1959), 236 (1956); repr. 1967: 1.127-8.

CamKC13.First Lines:
Seint marie dai in lente among oþer daies godeRiȝt his to
                    holde heye who so it wel vnderstode…
CamKC13.Last Lines:
…Now bidde we Ihesu godes sone þat on þat daie þe
                    wordle wrouȝteÞat we mote come to þilke ioie þat he vs
                    to brouȝte

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint Marie day in leynte among oþere dayes goedeRiȝt is
                    to holde heye who so hit wel vnderstode…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Now bydde we Ihesu godes sone þat þulke day þe
                    wordle wrouȝteÞat we mote come to þulke ioye þat he vs
                    to bouȝte

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint marie day in þe lente amonge oþer dawes
                    gouderyȝt is to holden heye wo so vnderstode…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…Now bidde we ihesu godes sone þat þulke day
                    wroȝteÞat we mot com to þulke ioie þat he ous to
                    boȝte

BLAdd10301.First Lines:
SEint Marie day in leinte among oþer dayis godeRiȝte is
                    for to holde heye ho so him vnder stode…
BLAdd10301.Last Lines:
…Nou bidde we ihesu godessone þat þulke hey day
                    wroȝteþat we mote come to þat Ioye þat he to vs
                    boȝte
BLAdd10301.Attributed Title:
De annunciacione dominica (f. 58v, by scribe in margin
                    beside first line); Annunciacio (RT)

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEint mari dai in lente among oþer dawes goderiȝt is for to holde hei ho so him vnþerstode…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …nou bidde we ihesu godes sone þat þilk dai hei wrouȝteþat we mote come to þilk Ioie þat he ous to brouȝte
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum xxv” added to right margin by later hand (f. 52).

BLEge1993.First Lines: Seint Marydai in lente among oþer dawes godeRiȝt is to holden heiȝe whose it vnderstode…
BLEge1993.Last Lines: …Now bidde we ihesu godes sone þat þilke day wrouȝteÞat we mote come to þat ioie þat he vs to bouȝte

BLEge2810.First Lines: SEint marie day in leinte Amonge oþer dawes godeRiȝt is to holde heie wo so him vndirstode…
BLEge2810.Last Lines: …Nou bidde we ihesu godis sone þat þilke day wroȝteÞat we mote come to þilke ioye þat he is to ybroȝte

BLHar2277.First Lines: SEinte Marie day in leynte among alle oþer dayes godeIs riȝt forto holde heȝe ho so him vnderstode…
BLHar2277.Last Lines: …Nou bidde we ihesu crist goddes sone þat þilke heȝe day wroȝteþat we mote come to þulke ioye þat he ous to wroȝte bouȝte
BLHar2277.Note: In last line, “wroȝte” incorrectly written and expunged before “bouȝte.”
BLHar2277.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library Harley MS 2277.
         https://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?index=0&ref=Harley_MS_2277.

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Seynt Mary day in lent amonge oþer daies goodRight is forto
                    holde hit who it wel vnderstood…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…Now preie we ihesu goddys sone þat þilk day
                    wrouȝtÞat we mote come to þat ioye þat he hem to
                    brouȝt
